meanings.definition: A document issued by an employer to an employee detailing the employee's pay for a specific period.
meanings.sent1: I always check my paystub to see how much money I earned.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to keep your paystub safe for future reference.
meanings.sent3: The paystub told me I worked hard this month, but my wallet disagrees.
meanings.sent4: Her paystub was like a map showing the journey of her hard work.
meanings.sent5: The paystub fluttered in the wind, a tangible proof of her dedication.

meanings.definition: To provide an employee with a paystub.
meanings.sent1: The HR department will paystub all employees at the end of the month.
meanings.sent2: It is essential for companies to paystub their employees accurately.
meanings.sent3: The boss paystubbed everyone promptly, earning their gratitude.
meanings.sent4: She paystubs her team diligently, ensuring transparency in payments.
meanings.sent5: As the manager, he paystubs his staff with precision and care.
